12:["$","p","12",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"连绵的战火已经延续了半年多，家书难得，一封抵得上万两黄金。"}]
13:["$","p","13",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"愁绪缠绕，白发愈搔愈短，简直要插不上头了。"}]
14:["$","hr","14",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
15:["$","h2","15",{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 border-b-2 border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-800","children":"创作背景"}]
16:["$","p","16",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"唐玄宗天宝十五年（756年）七月，安禄山攻陷长安，肃宗在灵武即位。杜甫在投奔灵武途中被俘，被困长安。次年三月，春回大地，鸟语花香，草木茂盛，但长安城满目荒凉，诗人触景生情，写下了这首传诵千古的五律。"}]
17:["$","hr","17",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
18:["$","h2","18",{"className":"text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-100 mt-12 mb-6 pb-4 border-b-2 border-stone-100 dark:border-stone-800","children":"名句赏析"}]
19:["$","p","19",{"className":"font-semibold text-stone-800 dark:text-stone-200 my-6 text-xl","children":"\"烽火连三月，家书抵万金\""}]
1a:["$","p","20",{"className":"text-stone-600 dark:text-stone-400 leading-relaxed my-4 text-lg","children":"战争年代，亲人之间的消息隔绝，一封家信显得无比珍贵。诗人用\"抵万金\"来形容家书的珍贵，表达了战乱中对亲人的深切思念。"}]
1b:["$","hr","21",{"className":"my-10 border-stone-200 dark:border-stone-800"}]
